Nim TestKit Documentation Generator

Generates documentation from tests and code coverage

Imports

config

Types

ModuleDoc = object
  name*: string
  tests*: seq[TestDoc]
  coverage*: float
  functions*: seq[string]
TestDoc = object
  name*: string
  description*: string
  file*: string
  passed*: bool
  coverage*: float

    tags: [ReadDirEffect, ReadIOEffect], forbids: [].}

    forbids: [].}

    ...raises: [IOError], tags: [TimeEffect, ReadDirEffect, ReadIOEffect],
    forbids: [].}
